name: PontiacRye
text: Pizza was delicious and beautiful. Staff was extremely kind. We enjoyed our meal, and had a great time. I definitely think this place is the best subway of pizzas. No other place can beat the flame cooked greatness this place offers.

name: Timothy Arndt
text: Pieology was fast and delicious. The breadsticks and pizza looked and smelled so good I had to take a bite before snapping a picture.

name: Marinela Wisen
text: Good way to get your creative juices going! $8.00 for a 11.5 inch pizza and no limit on toppings gives you unlimited options!!!! So worth a try!

name: Anthony Pearson
text: It's just like Subway but at Subway you make your own sub at Pieology you make your own pizza it's a really smart idea since when you ask a person what's their favorite food, 90% answer Pizza and now you get to make your own at a low cost!

name: Christian Bernardo
text: We haven't hear about this place until today. Pleasantly surprised. Lots of options. Pizza was great.

name: Jake Moore
text: Great pizza stop for lunch or an easy dinner! The build your own pizzas are fun to make and always come out awesome. Friendly staff and clean too! Highly recommend.

name: Anthony Muniz
text: Pizza and bread sticks have always come out tasting great! I generally get three meals out of my order as well, so the value is quite good

name: Sherri Lynn Noe
text: Love Pieology!  Can't find a better gluten-free pizza, with unlimited fresh toppings for under $10!  Normal crust pizzas are only $7.95. Great staff!  Quick in-and-out (within 10 minutes), or dine in.  Fresh salads as well.  I highly recommend this establishment!

name: Cory Eman
text: This is. Pretty cool place. The selection of specialty pizza (including gluten free). Pile on all the toppings you want for a set price.   The order to table process is super quick.  You order first and then grab a seat and wait but not long for your personal pie to be delivered to table.

name: Tim Schott
text: This is a favorite pizza stop. The process is like getting a sub from one of the many franchise sub places. They take freshly made dough, add the base topping of your choice, then add your choice of fresh toppings (lots of veggies and meats ‚Ä¶More

name: J S
text: Great pizza, dirty place. It's one thing to have a few crumbs on the table but the mat in front of the pop machine is rotting to the floor, the place smells sour,  the bathrooms are filthy and all the floors are too. They need to get a ‚Ä¶More

name: Bob Zomermaand
text: My wife and I had a cauliflower crust pizza that was genuinely delicious. We could hardly believe that we could choose any number of various toppings --all for the single price.  We know we will return when we get a hankering for pizza that is a delight.

name: Aaron Dake
text: Adequately staffed for the lunch rush, this place gets you through the door as fast as possible (for a pizza place).  Their sauce is awesome and they have plenty of fresh ingredients to choose from.  Great business model!  I order mine with ‚Ä¶More

name: Shawna Bennett
text: I am incredibly disappointed in my experience today. My family and I are regular customers because they are one of the only places where we can get a gluten free and dairy free pizza. We ordered 4 pizzas online and all of them were burned ‚Ä¶More

name: David Brock
text: Good pizza but nothing great. I would call it the subway of the pizza world. Good selection of toppings and pricing isn't bad at all

name: Nick Hilts
text: All of the low star reviews that mention slow and unprofessional staff are ridiculous, I work across the street and go here around 2-3 times a week! I have never had a single problem with them in the past 6 months! The food is delicious! As ‚Ä¶More

name: Ian Coburn
text: The pizza tastes really good, though the ordering process is a bit discombobulated at this location.  Having visited a few times, it seems that if you get through the ordering process smoothly, you'll have a great visit.  You might wind up ‚Ä¶More

name: Marissa Niemeyer
text: Has vegan and gluten free options! The crust is very light and crispy which I enjoyed. I wish they had more toppings options compared to herb and fire but I did enjoy how affordable they are.

name: Josh Toorenaar
text: I'm so happy to have one of these in the area now. The food is excellent in a very nice space. I love the idea of building your own pizza. I just wish this restaurant had booths and didn't make everything to look like a pizza (the churro, bread sticks). I hope they open more in the area. It would be great downtown.

name: Tim Dubbs
text: Love the Piology pizza but realize that one pizza feeds one person. Make your own custom pizza and it is done in about 5 minutes. I have enough left for lunch the next day. Delicious!

name: Pete Townsend
text: 3 pizzas + 4 drinks for a family of 4 was a bit steep at $37.  Might need to share two pizzas next time but that limits the topping choices.  Pizza tasted great.  Not a fan of thin crust but it was nice and crispy.  Restaurant was clean and service was excellent.

name: Jessica Ward
text: Prices are good for the amount of food. The pizza was very yummy. It didn't take vey long to get our food. We will definitely be going back

name: Matthew Roland Miller
text: This place is one of the best pizza places around town. While it is extremely creative and trendy, the food options and fresh ingredients are what make this place so great. And the fact that everything is unlimited toppings is amazing. ‚Ä¶More

name: m l
text: New school pizza... Definitely nicer than your average pizza . The prices are fair and they have a great selection of toppings and sauses. Will go again

name: Lonna Blair
text: Nice, clean and fresh ingredients. Pizza was delicious. I will be back.

name: Corey O'Brien
text: Holy smokes this place is awesome!! If your a pizza lover your not going to go wrong eating here. Unlimited toppings $7.95. I'll be eating here more often rather then Vitale's Pizza. Sorry Vitales

name: Jared Hine
text: Love their pizza fully customizable kind of like subway for pizza.  Very flavorful and reasonable wait time considering we went around the dinner rush.

name: Shawn Krooswyk
text: Subway style pizza restaurant. Good prices. Great topping selection.

name: Jordan DeGraaf
text: Tristan was very nice and friendly. Hard worker. Thank you for great service. Will definitely be back üëçüèª

name: Iceland
text:
First timers here.
The service was fast as could be and very friendly and Tristen was a doll. We liked all the choices. However, the pizza was severly burnt at the bottom. They ‚Ä¶More

name: Weather Account
text: Light unique crust, great topping choices, amazing prices, top notch employee personalities, delicious food. Everything was tasty, enjoyable and filling. Incredible experience.

name: Mark Perkin
text: Staff was very helpful for my first time here.  Nice options for pizzas. Very fast order turn around.  Good pizza! Good experience.

name: gib04g
text: We liked the pizza. The options and the whole environment are similar to another local (just local?) Pizza place called Herb & Fire. We'll try it again, for sure.

name: Anthony Punt
text: Our new weekly restaurant! $8 for enough pizza to feed 2 people (i think they are 12") plus unlimited toppings! They are fresh and amazing ingredients. We just make each half of the pizza like how we want then split. Seriously amazing pizza, watch for this place to blow up nationally.

name: William Baker
text: My daughter attends Cornerstone and told us about this place. She always talked it up so when we brought the whole family of 8, all were very impressed with everything we had. Will definitely be eating there again.

name: Matthew Sulka
text: They have awesome pizza, probably cuz I got to make it my own way but still they are like the Subway(or Jimmy John's if you like them better) of pizza! They're great!

name: Zachariah DeGraaf
text: Good pizza with an interesting take on how to make it. My group had a great time.

name: Mike Phillips
text: All I can say is WOW this is some good pizza. Low prices and get as many or as few toppings your heart desires.  Pizzas taste great, and the salads are big and tasty too. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Wrest
text: Great thin crust style with fresh ingredients. Easy to split between two people and reasonably priced. The BBQ chicken was awesome!

name: Harold Dost
text: 7.99 for any amount of toppings you want is great! Pizza was a little greasy, but I think that may have been a function of the toppings I chose.  Staff is friendly and quick.

name: Lynn Lawson
text: Fast, good food.  Nice place for a quick bite, built to order

name: Diane George
text: Fast and friendly service.  Lots of toppings choices as well as yummy lemonade flavors.

name: Jake Lang
text: It's a cool idea for a pizza place. Not the greatest pizza I've ever had, but it was good and a fun place to grab a bite. You could possibly even split a pizza depending on how hungry you were.

name: Becky Lammas
text: Always love our experience here and the fact that they can do gluten-free is so nice!

name: Aaron Merritt
text:
This place was great!
1 pizza unlimited toppings for under 9$!
They had a ton of different topping options, including vegan cheeses (say what? ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher Harris
text: What a great place. I took the family there for dinner and everyone loves it. The pizza is fresh and you watch them put the toppings on.

name: Kyle Domanski
text: If you give this place more than two stars then you have never been to herb and fire right across the road. My wife and I got a pizza and breadsticks from here it was very bland and the ingredients did not seem that fresh.  Seriously do yourself a favor and just go to herb and fire, it is so so much better.

name: M Lind
text: So very delicious! I thought their red sauce was very flavorful. The wait wasn't bad either for 11:30 on a Friday.

name: Hassan Rashid
text: Good Vegan and Vegetarian choices. Very affordable!

name: Nate
text: Excellent and fresh pizza.

name: Leanne M
text: Pieology is an amazing pizza shop that cares about their customers. They are friendly, inviting, and they always have great deals on their pizza! They also offer vegan options which is appreciated :)

name: Karen deLopez
text: Build your own pizza. Doesn't change the price to add more veggies, meat or cheese. Baked to perfection.

name: Jaron DeVito
text: Great experience with very low prices. Love the customization abilities.

name: Jeremy Woodward
text: Good pizza, totally customizable and for a reasonable price. Get your own personal pizza designed to your liking.

name: Jeremy&Trista Cookingham
text: Best pizza ive had in awhile. The service is fast and friendly. Couldnt ask for a better experience. Thanks guys keep up the good work.

name: Ryan Wilson
text: Friendly staff, quick service (for pizza), and a cheap, fresh, and delicious product. The best part is that you have no one but yourself to blame for any unhealthiness you put on your pizza haha!

name: Derrick Coombs
text: Love the topping selection and the service was great. Tristan and Jager were both super friendly and helpful! This is definitely one of my favorite lunch spots.

name: Eric Bearss
text: Great place. Everyone gets their own personal pizza with unlimited toppings. Kids love it and so do we

name: Lynn Hardy
text: Workers aren't very knowledgeable as to what's in the toppings you are putting on your pizza.  But they are delicious

name: Andrew Weiss
text: Great food!

name: M G
text: Like a Subway for pizza. Pick your crust flavor, oil type and sauce. Then top with any of their cheese, veggie, and meat options. Decent price and extremely good.

name: Michael Baumeister
text: Always good quick service. Always have my pizza within 4 or 5 minutes of sitting down.

name: Kathleen Buell
text: I've never had a bad experience here, the pies are always good. If you sign up for emails you get a BOGO coupon on your birthday too, it's good for a month

name: Ceci Gipson
text: The pizza here is absolutely the best of the best. I love how they offer vegan/gluten free options, and they have things that I normally haven't found on pizza which is great!

name: Dalton V.
text: This is an excellent pizza shop. I absolutely love the design. This place is a subway for pizza. $8 and you can put as much of whatever you want on it.

name: Persis Hill
text: So happy to find a pizza place that my little grandson can enjoy a pizza that caters to all his allergies. He was so happy he got to eat pizza with everyone else.

name: John Rice
text: Great place for quick bite. They have gluten free.

name: PunchyParadeYT
text:
My experience at pieology was great
They serve great food they have great service and we're really fast and nice. Also great prices.

name: Aaron Topping
text: Good pizza not too high in price. I like how you can add unlimited toppings.

name: Gerid Adams
text: Awesome food!  I thought they smallest was way too big but it was so good that I ate the whole thing.

name: Robbi Schmenk
text: Super fun and friendly staff! They made great recommendactions to help me enjoy the woo experience! Thank you so much!

name: Erica D'Ascenzo
text: Delicious, quick, and reasonably priced! 4 stars just because sometimes the quality depends on the person making it.

name: Monica Jackson
text: Good food and reasonable prices.

name: Shane Sievers
text: Ingredients are hit or miss. Some taste and look fresh, other items looked straight out of a can. Overall most pies come out ok. Feel bad seeing all the employees with burns from the equipment.

name: Dan Mlnarik
text: Great pizza at a great price.

name: Joseph Girgis
text: Smokin buffalo chicken was delicious! Pizza only took 5 min to cook.

name: Co Bald
text: Love this place. Everythings consistent, fast and delicious.

name: Sandra anderson
text: Great place to eat, quality, make your own pizza pie, economical too!

name: Etonia Todd
text: Very good! Nice to get it made exactly as you want for a flat price.

name: Cane & Pole
text: Great make your own pizza experience.  Good salads.

name: Brianna DeWitt
text: Love being able to pick my own favorite pizza toppings for an individualized experience.

name: Rudy Vinkemulder
text: Everyone can get exactly what they like.  Pizza is good.  We will be back.

name: Brittany Schuyten
text: Amazing food and service, incredible gluten free pizza! They have separate paddles, sauce, and cheese for gluten free pizza as well.

name: Luke Fabricatore
text: Very clean, modern eatery with great food and friendly staff. I will definitely come here again!

name: Brian Aho
text: Great pizza with a lot of customisation. My wife and I split one because it was a fair amount. The only draw back about the building itself is it's kind of loud. Senses are in overload. Other than that great experience.

name: Sara Smith
text: Fun staff.  Great pizza.  Great price.

name: Aubry Elerick
text: Lauren and Jager were great! Super friendly and make a bomb pizza too :)

name: zachariahpictures
text: This place is great! Customizable pizza for a reasonable price? Yes, please!

name: Ashley Purry
text: SOOOO YUMMY!!!! I LOVE PIEOLOGY!!! GREAT PIZZA GREAT STAFF!!!

name: Jenika Turnquist
text: Good price and delicious! The lemonades they have are super good too!!

name: Olin Banks
text: Good service at this location, and as always the pizza is awesome!

name: Avin M
text:
Delicious  pizzas  at a great price.
Around 8$ per pizza with as many toppings as you wantüòãüòã.  Clean place with friendly people.

name: mike davey
text: Good idea.  Poor execution.  The toppings are run of the mill,  the crust is very disappointing.  Good for a budget, I guess. The Subway of pizza is right.

name: Dan Carrigan
text: Awesome pizza that you can completely customize. Bigger than we expected and a great deal!

name: David Washburn
text: Artisanal it is not, but it is very good pizza made by great people, with great service.  Perfect for the family before heading across the street for a movie.

name: Christian Butler
text: Best pizza place on the north east side of gr

name: Ryan Gravelle
text: Good food, fresh ingredients, good service.

name: Christie Smith
text: Love it!  Make it how you like it pizza.

name: ryan van houten
text: Unlimited topping on a pizza for $8.  I'm in!!!

name: Kyle Klingenberg
text: Good sandwiches and sides. Friendly and fast staff.

name: Byron James Brazier II
text: Amazing food, great staff, highly recommend

name: Anna G
text: Decent pizza, love the build your own options. Employees can be rude and don't listen though.

name: Kyle Metz
text: Delicious pizza, great selection of toppings, and you can't beat the price.

name: Heidi S
text: Love their gluten free pizza and dairy free cheese!

name: John Wolbert
text: Pizza was amazing! $3.14 on PI Day 3/14!

name: don pease
text: Good food and decent prices.

name: Lauren Abosamra
text: I will definitely be back! Hopefully every day! Unlimited toppings for under 8 dollars. Even daya vegan cheese and gluten free dough! Num Num Num

name: Ken S
text: Good place for an oven baked customizable pizza.

name: Balaji Vutla
text: Custom made thin crust medium to large size pizzas with unlimited toppings...

name: Tyler Johnson
text: Great pizza and even better service!

name: Joe Helle
text: Great food, absolutely love how customizable their pizzas are. Very wide selection.

name: Steve Wright
text: Design your own pizza. Excellent!

name: Ron Dickerson
text: Love this place.  Pizza the way you want it.

name: John Erickson
text: Great pizza at cheep price

name: Jason Bergman
text: Staff is very friendly and its a great place to bring your kids.

name: Ben Johnson
text: You can't beat this price for an amazing pizza with unlimited toppings!

name: Everette Binger
text: This place is fantastic!  Great service as well as excellent food.

name: Shaun Giller
text: Perfect pizza. Perfect size, variety of toppings, price and speed.

name: Conrad
text: Decent value but not very great food. It's decent but wish they had thicker crust.

name: dlmifields
text: Friendly service, Great pizza!  We finally found our pizza place in Grand Rapids.

name: Nick Ignatoski
text: Super good custom pizza place with very friendly service.

name: William Hildreth
text: Love! Be sure to ask for your pizza cooked a little longer. Eveytime I haven't asked my dough has still been a bit raw.

name: Brad Fewins
text: I loved how I could add whatever topping I wanted and however much of it I wanted!

name: Bethany Marmo
text: Great pizza! Delicious thin crust

name: Aaron Edward
text: Fast, friendly, pizza. If you don't like how it tasted, you probably picked the wrong toppings.

name: Mandi Meier
text: great place. uppity staff, fast service, & accuracy for the most part.

name: Shalee Miedema
text: Good pizza with vegan cheese, crust and topping options.

name: David Thwaites
text: Great pizza with nice topping selection!

name: Benjamin Todd

name: Hayden Pomper
text: So much food for the price!

name: John Vidro
text: Great foos and service.

name: Frank Conner

text: Love it! Very friendly and competent staff!!!
